website_summaries.verdict: A beautifully presented aromatherapy candle infused with the soothing scent of ylang ylang. As pleasing to the eye as it is to the nose.
pros: A high quality candle made with perfume grade fragrance oils, pure cotton wicks, and 100% soy wax
Notes of ylang ylang, jasmine, chamomile, and musk work together to relax and revitalize tired minds
Comes in an elegant rose gold holder, making it a gift-worthy option
Long burning time of 60 to 80 hours
cons: Some users felt the scent was a bit too intense and floral

customer_reviews.title: Lovely candles
customer_reviews.text: These candles were a gift for my daughter and she hasn't burned them yet, but they are lovely and smell wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good until it was about to burn out
customer_reviews.text: I loved this candle for its look and sent until it was about to burn out. At that point instead of flicking out there appears to have been something (maybe extra wick) in the bottom it created a large flame in the jar which over heated and left burn marks on the wood table it was sitting on. I reached out to the company before posting this review but got no reply.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Smells great for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Candle scent is very strong, sweet and floral top notes. The top looked a little weird when it arrived but didn't affect the product or burning. So far it burns evenly but has trouble melting to the sides even after burning for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa (Live)

customer_reviews.title: ) After order and received it I just love the flowery blend of fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I bought the candle after smelled it at a friend's house. The unique jasmine and ylang smell is so captive that everybody commented on it after went into the power room. (Where it's placed.) After order and received it I just love the flowery blend of fragrance, So summery and refreshing. Want to recommend to all, if you like a unique smell candle, this will be it. You will love it!
customer_reviews.author: y zhang

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful & smells delightful!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought me this candle for my Bday in January and since then I have bought 3 more. This candle smells so good and i luv the rose gold. After I'm done with the candle I cleaned it out and use the container for my makeup brushes and other bathroom knickknacks. This candle comes beautifully packaged and great for gifts or get a few to treat yourself❤
customer_reviews.author: Mayumi Muller

customer_reviews.title: A new go to candle
customer_reviews.text: This is now my favorite candle! I have never smelled something so beautiful and light. I would buy one for all of my friends and it would make a beautiful hostess 🎁 Gift it’s Amazing
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Bajhart

customer_reviews.title: Scratched jar, horrible smell.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a birthday gift and when it arrived, the rose gold was tarnished in places and had multiple blemishes (bubbles, scrapes, etc). The smell was awful too. It smells like an old lady's perfume. I had one of my coworkers give me their honest opinion, and they said the same thing about the smell (old lady). Today is the birthday dinner and I'm going to give her the present with the caveat that if she too hates the smell, I can easily return it and get a different one. I was looking forward to this too. It's beautiful in theory, but just awful all-around.
customer_reviews.author: MRMB

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and modern
customer_reviews.text: High quality, high fragrance, beautiful candle. Gave as a gift and she loved. I’m not sure scent was my favorite but I’m not the biggest fan of jasmine so wouldn’t hold that against it. Would be a nice bathroom scent for sure and if you like the smell of jasmine/ylang ylang I would definitely go for it! I needed a christmas gift quick and it worked out perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: A. Marie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the scent and the container is a beautiful rose gold and I love the shape of it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty container. The package was protected with bubble wrap
customer_reviews.text: Lovely soft scent. Pretty container. The package was protected with bubble wrap, plus the candle box was inside a thick foam box and sealed as well. No scratches etc. I ordered this by accident but I'm about to order another one.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Great Candle!
customer_reviews.text: I got this candle for a gift. It smells very good and is very pretty! Great product for the price I want to get myself one know.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Lee

customer_reviews.title: A lot of scent in a little candle
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the rich scent of this candle and the little shiny copper color container (4 inches high) looks great in any room or decor. The relaxing scent of ylang ylang and jasmine wafts through the house and makes it smell great!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Johnson

customer_reviews.title: If not for the scent, buy for the holder!
customer_reviews.text: Over all this brand has been hit or miss through amazon. The candle doesn't seem to have as strong of a scent as I had hoped, but the holder is awesome and I'll continue to use that once the candle is gone.
customer_reviews.author: A.Sometimes_DFW

customer_reviews.title: I like the scent but question the 65 horus of burn time and price just went up 1 dollar.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice candle, love the scent and the decorative jar it is in . But I question the 65 hours of burn time they purport to having. This thing goes pretty quick. And another thing about this candle is once you light it, the wick gets exposed and rather long wick which makes the flame a little bigger than I think it needs to be. This is probably what is contributing to it's quick burn effect. *** One more thing I noticed. The price seems to have gone up a dollar since I bought it a month ago. How is that possible?? Kind of annoying....
customer_reviews.author: john merritt

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful candle with a nice and not overpowering scent
customer_reviews.text: This candle had an immediate soothing scent when I opened it. It was packaged very nicely and definitely would make a nice gift. We are starting to use candles throughout our home and bathrooms and are already looking at the other colors in this line. We are trying out different candles because we want all the bathrooms to be uniform and have the same line or candles. Will be looking at the pink Jasmine one next!
customer_reviews.author: M. Shieh

customer_reviews.title: Elegant, classy candles.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for myself, now these are my "Go To" Christmas gift. They are elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Marko Realmonte

customer_reviews.title: Lovely candle to keep or gift
customer_reviews.text: Has a very light scent, but I mostly bought it for looks. The container is very pretty and has a glam look to it. The box was encased in foam so it was well-protected in transit, and it was in an attractive gift box. I’d happily give it as a gift. I’ve purchased quite a few candles from this brand and have been impressed by all of them.
customer_reviews.author: L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Smells like sweet flowers Horrible
customer_reviews.text: This product has no jasmine smell in it what so ever! If you are actually wanting Jasmine and Ylang Ylang this is not it. It smells like sweet sweet flowers and not in a great way! I wanted Jasmine and Ylang Ylang as they stated ////far from it! Believe me, I don't usually write a product review yet this is horrible if you think that is what you are ordering. Unless you have a huge room stay away!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Harper

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice !!
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent. Very nice packaging and the rose gold candle container is very nice! Makes for a very nice gift !
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great scent and burned nicely, however, the rose gold was totally scratched off and looked damaged when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: TKEGG

customer_reviews.title: Simply azing
customer_reviews.text: Easily the best candle I have ever bought, during this purchase I bought 5 different ones and just lit each on to see , well 1 of these candles out performed 4 others combined I put it in a guest room shut the door and it still out performed the ones that where in the room I was in I assure you if you buy this you will be happy
customer_reviews.author: Crider Family

customer_reviews.title: Terrible overpowering smell
customer_reviews.text: Definitely do not waste your money. The sent was so overwhelmingly powerful I had to put it immediately in ziploc bag and throw away out in my dumpster to get it out of my house. Terrible! The only good thing I can say about it is that the candle holder was attractive. It was so bad I didn't even want to have to full with sending it back, I just wanted it out.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: While the packaging is beautiful, this candle has no scent. I’ve purchased 3 candles from this brand and only 1 actually had a scent. (Rose oud). My mother also bought this candle and she said the same thing. Money down the drain.... and it’s not like the scent is subtle, there’s literally no smell. The only thing this brand has going for them are the pretty jars that the candles come in but the actual candle is completely useless. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Adriane

customer_reviews.title: I hated this candle at first
customer_reviews.text: I hated this candle at first and then started to like it mixed with other, more floral or warm candles. It is very strong at first but I couldn't smell it once it got past the halfway mark. The rose gold jar is beautiful. I never heard back from this seller when I wanted to return the candle... terrible customer service, for sure.
customer_reviews.author: OliviaAut

customer_reviews.title: Frickin Amazeballs!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite thing about this candle is that you don’t even need to burn it for it to put out the smell as you walk by. I have it sitting on the corner of a table in my living room so as you walk by you can smell it every time. The scent is amazing I ordered the Plumaria and can’t wait to get it
customer_reviews.author: R. Lipham

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible, looks nothing like the photo
customer_reviews.text: The photo shows a pink candle holder with candle. This is NOT pink, it is a metallic copper and the paint had some chipped spots. It smells terrible. It is awful. I can't imagine trying to actually burn it. This is possibly the most disappointing purchase I have ever made on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: tamn

customer_reviews.title: Rose gold candle holder
customer_reviews.text: Such a pretty candle! While I’m not a big fan of the scent as it’s pretty strong for me (buyer beware if this isn’t your type of scent), the rose gold candle holder was what I was really looking for to complement some of my home decor. It fits in perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gift giving and home decor.
customer_reviews.text: LJM is my candle supplier from now on. They burn cleanly, long lasting scent and they look elegant. I’m done with the chemical scent and burnt smell like Bath and Body candles. They come beautifully packaged, perfect for gift giving just be sure to gift yourself too!
customer_reviews.author: C. Rich

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift for my mom and she loved it. It comes in a very nice packaging to protect the candle from breaking during shipping. The candle itself smells great and burns even. The modern geometric design is very girlie and fun. Looks great in a bathroom or on a bar cart. Will buy again for gifts in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Lunsford

customer_reviews.title: Sent back
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite candle and I've purchased from this seller before. Unfortunately as soon as I opened the box something was not right. This is not a La Jolie candle. It did not smell right, the color was wearing off, the black sticker on the bottom was NOT a La Jolie sticker. It simply said "100% soy candle". It should have the La Jolie sticker. There was a piece of paper covering the candle that was greasy and dirty. Not sure what happened between my last candle and now but I won't be purchasing anymore.
customer_reviews.author: NikkiM

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality candle and I really like the copper colored container. I am fussy about candles and dislike cheap smelling candles. This smells wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Shiny Happy People

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this once, and then two more times because I liked the smell so much. If you don’t light it, it’s just really nice and beautiful to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Yosef Dahan

customer_reviews.title: Great candle!
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of this candle! Unlit, it somewhat smells like a bathroom airfreshner but when lit the scent is amazing. Floral without being sickeningly sweet. Hint of an herbal undertone. And the presentation is gorgeous. I'll definitely be figuring out a way to reuse this container after the candle is used!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Reed

customer_reviews.title: Smells Bad
customer_reviews.text: I was really encouraged to purchase this as a gift for my mother after seeing all the positive reviews, but this candle had a strong synthetic aroma that made it useless. It's hard to buy an aromatic gift 'scent unseen.' I do not recommend taking a chance with this candle.
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen Faubert

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and shape.
customer_reviews.text: The fragrance is not my favorite, but I love the color and shape. (I just won't light it:)
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Its great at first
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing at firat but once you burn the candle down halfway you start to not be able to smell it anymore...
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite scent
customer_reviews.text: This scent is amazing and it has a lot of burn time.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S. McGough

customer_reviews.title: Just splurge on it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really likes it she said the smell was so strong (in a good way) that she didn't have to light it and her room had this really nice scent from the candle.i want one for My self
customer_reviews.author: Momma bear

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t care for the scent. The candle is beautiful and burns well.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Reid

customer_reviews.title: If heaven had a smell...
customer_reviews.text: Ok, most expensive candle I ever bought but so worth it. Beautiful box, beautiful color that would look great as an accessory anywhere and the scent is to die for...
customer_reviews.author: Philip T

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but not very strong
customer_reviews.text: The candle is in a very pretty container, but the scent is faint. It is also a sweet, rather than woody, seasonal fragrance. Not bad, but not great.
customer_reviews.author: ngpereda

customer_reviews.title: Update: No fragrance to enjoy
customer_reviews.text: Update: I decided to try the candle again and I can smell it now. Its very nice. I think the top of the candle may have not had much fragrance but once it burns down it gets stronger. Overall I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: misspinkk

customer_reviews.title: Buy two!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this candle as a gift, but once I opened it and smelled it I ended up keeping it for myself :) first, its gorgeous. Second, the smell is so lovely and not at all over powering. It reminds me of my grandmother’s garden <3
customer_reviews.author: Elle C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice candle, great holder
customer_reviews.text: This candle has a decent scent, and not too overpowering. The box and holder are excellent as well. Lasts as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Looks and smells good
customer_reviews.text: It smells amazing. I got once in a signature box and this time decided to buy due to the quality. It's hard to find a good price and quality for a candle. And plus it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: This smells really good! Bought it for my grand daughter and she loves it. Pretty looking too!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly J Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: wonderful stuff so relaxing beautiful ingredients and came fast.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this natural massage oil. It is so light and refreshing for busy career people who need stress relieve and relaxation.
customer_reviews.author: jenifer golden

customer_reviews.title: Sensuous and nice.
customer_reviews.text: The scent is a bit unusual but warm, pleasant and natural. it definitely grows on you. The container is very nice also. Sensuous and nice.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Amazing smell and lasts a long time. Super cute candle holder too. One of my favorite candles.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Miller

customer_reviews.title: Old Lady Scent, Get the Other Ones
customer_reviews.text: Smelled like old ladies.. had to return. The amount you get is also misleading, with the other option being you get 4 small (much better smelling) candles for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Buy the bigger one
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bigger one prior to this and it smelled great but you can barely smell anything in this smaller version.
customer_reviews.author: annica carlin

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good
customer_reviews.text: This candle smells great and is more than half the price of a NEST candle , will definitely be getting this again
customer_reviews.author: DHN

customer_reviews.title: Great smell.
customer_reviews.text: Only downside is that we liked it so much we burned it every day. Didnt last to long that way.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: La Jolie is my new favorite brand of candles
customer_reviews.text: tina daughter: these candles are amazing! not only are they inexpensive, but they last for so long and smell SO good. highly recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Carter

customer_reviews.title: Lovely scent
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it's lasting a long time and gives off the nicest scent.
customer_reviews.author: bmbpdx

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Smelling Candle
customer_reviews.text: Smells incredible! Easily one of my favorites. It is on the pricey side & has an average burn time, not long & not short.
customer_reviews.author: ForensicPhD

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but stinky
customer_reviews.text: This is a super cute candle, but the scent isn’t the greatest. Kinda wish this had a lid so I can walk past it without smelling it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing and lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: These candles are GREAT. I got them as gifts and might have kept an extra one or two for myself.
customer_reviews.author: christina lowe

customer_reviews.title: lovely candle
customer_reviews.text: great candle! the very shiny rose gold holder looks even better in person. burns nicely and smells wonderful. love La Jolie Muse candles!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for a coworker and she absolutely loves it!!! I’m very very happy about the purchase and I am going to get one for myself
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Pretty for a special occasion
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty. Sort of pricey. Ordered to match decor for a rose-gold wedding shower.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Frasure

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful smelling candle
customer_reviews.text: Such an impressive candle for the price. The scent is intense and I love it! The packaging is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: It’s a little smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: It smells nice but it’s a little too small for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but pricey for the size.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely packed and scent is pleasant. Smaller than expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Ann

customer_reviews.title: Too strong
customer_reviews.text: The smell of this was way too strong. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: AlisonNJ

customer_reviews.title: Smell is soooo good.
customer_reviews.text: Loved how it filled my room with a good scent and didn't cause me any headache. The blend is so energizing.
customer_reviews.author: shaikha

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: smells AMAZING, looks BEAUTIFUL, this made a great mothers day gift... i also rebought one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Khal Mustafa

customer_reviews.title: Best scented candle.
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! It’s next to my bed, even when unlit it gives such a great ambiance... the scent is the best I ever picked online. I Swear...
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle S.R

customer_reviews.title: 👎
customer_reviews.text: Candle arrived completely smashed - smelled nice wish I could’ve used it
customer_reviews.author: M. MAYER

customer_reviews.title: My Mom Loved It!
customer_reviews.text: I got this candle for my mom for her birthday and she has bought it twice now since then. Great gift, perfect holder and smells great!
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Wick became useless right away
customer_reviews.text: I got a bad candle. The wick broke off and became useless and short with first burn. Never had this experience before. Can't say I smelled fragrance, either.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Penniston

customer_reviews.title: Love, love this brand
customer_reviews.text: Can't say it enough. Love, love this brand. Such a fresh scent and beautiful canisters.
customer_reviews.author: T. Arreygue

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous candle.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful gift for my mother in law who loves anything copper. Smells amazing, too.
customer_reviews.author: Pipi Gage

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Looks and smells pretty! It was a gift and the recipient said she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: thejenspot

customer_reviews.title: Amazing scent!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing scent. I gave it as a gift, so I cannot say anything about clean burn or burn time, but is smelled fantastic just in the box!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Schaapveld

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my mom for mother's day. She loves the scent and the jar it comes in.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Nasty! Made in China
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about you, but I don't want to be burning a candle that was made in China. They try to obscure the fact that this is where the product is from but all you have to do is peel off the label on the box. Some seriously toxic horrible crap is manufactured in China. I won't be burning this.
customer_reviews.author: Angela K

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: This candle makes my entire living room smell amazing, even without being lit
customer_reviews.author: S. Towe

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This candle is beautiful. The color is lovely rose and the cup has a great presentation. The scent is a bit strong but is pleasant and flowery. IT is packed beautifully and I will be giving it to a mentor as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Smells AMAZING, burns kind of funny though
customer_reviews.text: Smells AMAZING, burns kind of funny though. Still would buy again though, it literally made my whole house smell wonderful even when it was lit!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing and great copper color!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty and shiny copper holder, which is an original design and very solid. The scent is really amazing and made my kitchen smell great without even being lit!
customer_reviews.author: Zach Kissinger

customer_reviews.title: Special Scent
customer_reviews.text: Great scent with soy smell, which makes this candle so special and unique.
customer_reviews.author: College7935

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: Love this candle. Smell is great and it even gives off a nice fragrance without burning. The look of it is also aesthetically pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: C. E. Gwatkin

customer_reviews.title: Long burning and great fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these candles many times and will continue to do so. They are some of the best I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Z

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love it, smells so good I cant wait to light it! The rode gold container is gorgeous. And it is bigger than I was expecting so that was a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Fadely

customer_reviews.title: NICE CANDLE
customer_reviews.text: THE SIZE IS PERFECT, HOWEVER THE SMELL IS KING OF INDIAN I LITTLE BIT TO STRONG FOR ME .
customer_reviews.author: lany nelson

customer_reviews.title: maybe it's just me, but
customer_reviews.text: almost combusted... the presentation is nice... the scent is okay but it almost burned my place down! wont buy again but was nice while it lasted
customer_reviews.author: Dinah

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Candle Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best candles I’ve ever had. The smell is amazing and it’s a very cute decoration piece. I would highly recommend this purchase, whether it's for a gift or personal use .
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: got me since the packaging! so cute and neat! the smell is just heartwarming !
customer_reviews.author: mafuang

customer_reviews.title: Great burn time, smells great.
customer_reviews.text: This candle burns at a great rate, and it smells amazing! I love how it’s more natural and doesn’t give me a headache.
customer_reviews.author: baley

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good!
customer_reviews.text: Smells so good! I wish these came on auto-delivery plan!
customer_reviews.author: suz

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for the price and smells lovely
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and looks great. Would make a great gift. Smells fragrant and pleasant even when not lit.

customer_reviews.title: The person loved it! I may buy one for myself soon
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. The person loved it! I may buy one for myself soon.
customer_reviews.author: Marcella H. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling candle
customer_reviews.text: Great candle with a cute vase that you can clean and reuse. The scent radiated through my home.
customer_reviews.author: Darling C.

customer_reviews.title: Not overly perfume-y
customer_reviews.text: The candle isn’t too strong, more of a subtle scent when burned for a while, which I like. The scent itself is very nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Sabine

customer_reviews.title: Smell really good. it is a strong but very pleasant smell
customer_reviews.text: Smell really good. it is a strong but very pleasant smell. I didn't even need to light it up to and I can already smell it. Perfect for my little studio apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This candle is amazing. It's really pretty to look at and smells wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Peaks

customer_reviews.title: Love the beautiful candles
customer_reviews.text: They look amazing. And smell so sweet. It burns evenly and no weird smoke after scent.
customer_reviews.author: patricia h.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Scent is VERY strong and fragrant. But overall I love it
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: The scent is light and not overpowering. I just ...
customer_reviews.text: The scent is light and not overpowering. I just purchased this last week and it is almost gone. I light this candle everyday. That's how much I am enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Coleen Murray

product_meta.title: Ylang Ylang Aromatherapy Scented Candle Gift,10Oz 100% Soy Wax 65 Hours Burn, Candle Gifts for Women
feature_bullets: ★ FRAGRANT FUSION - This candle is jam-packed with the decadent scent of ylang-ylang fused with comforting notes of jasmine, chamomile and musk to bring you the ultimate relaxation experience guaranteed by our high-quality products at a fraction of the cost.

★ YLANG-YLANG AROMATHERAPY – Ylang-ylang not only has a delicate, soft and relaxing aroma but is also scientifically proven to act as a stress-reliever which is why it has become a household name and a favorite among aromatherapists.
★ SIZE & BURN TIME – 10oz/285g. Long-lasting burning of 60-80 hours guaranteed to bring you maximized relaxation.

★ 100% SOY WAX - Made using lead-free cotton wicks and premium, soft, highly-refined perfume-grade fragrance oils and pure soy wax to bring you a biodegradable and eco-friendly product that will give you a clean burn and long-lasting hours of aromatic bliss. Paraben and cruelty free!
★ 100% SATISFACTION - We provide full refunds and returns if there are any problems after receiving the product.
